item.useful_pills.black_out_pill.tooltip: Returns you back to your last know respawn location.
item.useful_pills.water_pill.lore: A mysterious pill crafted from the depths of the ocean.
item.useful_pills.cure_insomnia_pill.too: Cures insomnia and prevents phantoms from spawning
item.useful_pills.cure_insomnia_pill.lor: A remedy passed down through generations.
item.useful_pills.fire_resistance_pill.t: Grants fire resistance and allows you to see clearly in lava
item.useful_pills.stealth_pill.tooltip: A pill that makes you undetectable by Sculk Shriekers.
